researchers.author: lashawn_pulkoski
researchers.post: I am not a scientist but I have eyes.  I wish they could explain the lack of distance between the front of the image and the back.  I placed a blanket on my head there was an 8-inch gap of where my face would have touched the front and where my head would have touched the back.  Looking at the PHOTOs there is less than 2 inches.  This is also depicted in most of the artwork that I've seen.  I do not doubt that there was one at some time in the past.  I would just like someone to explain the lack of distance between the face and the back.
researchers.title: Shroud News - August 2007
